item.title: Helpzzzzzzz!
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

im adding a death command that brings yout to public void death()

public void kill() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "ZOMGZ! IT'S DEATH!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(837); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }
Whenever i use it in game, everything goes well and all but people just stay at animation 837. How so?

Read full topic
